item.title: HDR Image Formats Explained (III): UltraHDR and MPF
item.description: Identify UltraHDR images by detecting hdrgm:Version=1.0 in the JPEG's XMP metadata, per Google's spec, which includes a primary image and gainmap for HDR rendering.

item.title: HDR Image Format Analysis (II): JPEG and Its Modifications
item.description: Learn JPEG file structure: SOI/EOI markers, metadata, JFIF format. Use a free parser to analyze binary segments (FF D8, FF D9) and compressed data.

item.title: Decoding HDR Image Formats (I): Basic Concepts of Gainmap
item.description: Gainmaps and UltraHDR enhance JPEGs with dual-layer HDR, using a base image and a gainmap with XMP metadata like Min, Max, and Gamma.
